title: Hacked and perma banned
body:
Hey guys.

I recently have had my account details hacked/guessed and was given a 2week suspension.
upon logging in i now have been permanently banned.

How is this even possible, i have received 0 contact from Riot themselves and it seems very unreasonable to discard me so.

Has nayone had any similar experiences, and what is there to do with the money spent?

replies.body:
If still possible, change your password immediately.

Then submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They will ask you a bunch of questions to verify ownership of the account. You don't have to answer all of them, but most is a good ballpark. You can also offer any other information that is unique to the account but not visible on the account to aid this process.

Once ownership is verified and the account is secure you can go through the process with support to have any penalties issued as a result of compromise revoked and the account restored.

You should also change the passwords of any emails or other accounts that share a password with your League account. I would also recommend running a virus scan.

Ok, sounds like a good plan.
i shall do this also

Ironically i have had my computer rebuilt 3days before my suspension =/

Changing your password at this point will do nothing, if your account is already permanently banned, it will stay permanently banned. It has happened to me the in past, contacted support and all. They just say you need to look after your account better.
RIot doesn't give a fuck, just money money money.
